sentences.en: A watermelon is red inside and green outside.
He weighed the watermelon by hand .
sentences.cn: 他用手估量西瓜的重量。

sentences.en: I bought a watermelon and some peaches.
sentences.cn: 我买了一个西瓜和一些桃子。

sentences.en: Iced fruit jelly, watermelon with fruit, caramelized apple and eight - treasure rice pudding.
sentences.cn: 服:冰镇果羹 、 什锦瓜瓶, 拔丝苹果和八宝饭.

sentences.en: If watermelon is unavailable, grapes can be substituted in an equivalent amount.
sentences.cn: 如果西瓜难以获得, 用相等数量的葡萄来代替.

sentences.en: If we kind of red beans, mung bean, watermelon long drawn!
sentences.cn: 如果我们种红豆 、 绿豆,长得出西瓜吗!
喔唷, 这么大的西瓜!

sentences.en: The bigger is a watermelon, the sweeter is it.
The fruit they need is apples, oranges, grapes and watermelon.
sentences.cn: 他们需要的水果有苹果, 柳丁, 葡萄及西瓜.

sentences.en: The pulp of this watermelon is too spongy.
The watermelon is green without and red within.
The watermelon slipped from his hands and fell to pieces.
sentences.cn: 西瓜从他手里滑落,摔得粉碎.

sentences.en: The woman cut up the watermelon and shared it out among the four children.
sentences.cn: 那妇人把西瓜切开,分给四个小孩.

sentences.en: There would be watermelon on the vine, and red tomatoes.
sentences.cn: 藤蔓上结着西瓜和西红柿.

sentences.en: This kind of watermelon is remarkable for its size.
Watermelon , summer high quality goods, always been loved by the people.
sentences.cn: 西瓜, 夏令佳品, 历来深受人们喜爱.

trans.tran_en: a large round fruit with hard green skin, red flesh, and black seeds
a large round fruit with hard green skin, red flesh, and black seeds
